articles.author: Sam Meredith
articles.title: Airbus shares fall on reports of new quality issue on dozens of A320 aircraft - CNBC
articles.description: Shares of Airbus plunged to the bottom of the pan-European Stoxx 600 index on Monday morning.
articles.content:
Shares of European aerospace giant Airbus fell as much as 10% on Monday, following reports the company has discovered an industrial quality issue regarding dozens of A320-family aircraft. 
The flaw,… [+1716 chars]
